comments.body: We want to test the actual facts and their values. While you don't have to do it in this PR we should potentially look at adding these further checks to the `azure_rm_sqlserver` module and use the facts module to check that the operations worked as expected.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +28,32 @@  assert:
    that:
      - output.changed == False
      - output.servers.sqlsrv{{ rpfx }}.id != None
      - output.servers.sqlsrv{{ rpfx }}.name == "sqlsrv{{ rpfx }}"
